narrator:
Welcome Test0 you have been abducted to be tested in our facility. 
You may think what is this surrounding, well you are basically in a box of imagination, the more you explore the more deeper it gets.
Complete my deeds and you shall be free.
For a hint, go look for a witch, she has a potion that i looovee to drink, but be aware she doesn't like stangers.

Look who's back, you sure didn’t fail me, now go ahead and take a sip of the potion
(J) Drink Potion
(K) Refuse

Good. I like the obedient Subjects
Press 'n' for next quest
witch:
Witch: Oh my who are you, do not come near me or I will curse you.
(J) Run back, (K) Ask for the potion, (L) Charge at her

Narrator: You Coward!

Press Q to go back

The witch curses you and kicks you out!

Press Q to go back

Witch: Oh you must be sent by ‘them’ well to get this potion you need to solve 
this riddle for me.
There is a circular platform with a large rod having its length same as the
radius of the platform, with its one kept at the center.
It moves 90 degree in z axis and burst in thin strips equally and lands at the
edge of the circle. Which shape does it form?

(J) Sphere, (K) Hemisphere, (L) Cone

There you go my boy here is the potion.

Press Q to go back

Wrong answer my boy!

Press Q to go back
